Firebrand

Destiny Playbook

Fire is the ultime problem solver, as you have already demonstrated. Now to demonstrate further.

Requirements

To become the Firebrand, you must have solved at least three problems with fire.

The Firebrand starts with Firestarter.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-firebrand.Item.yZJKNhItemZLM8vX]{Firestarter}

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • You become immune to fire, and cannot take damage from fire, heat, or explosions.
  • Take a Firebrand Custom.
  • Take a Firebrand Custom.
  • Take a Firebrand Custom.
